title: Bug 8142: No scoped type hierarchy on binary projects
description: When trying to view the scoped type hierarchy on binary projects, I am unable to understand the behavior.
OB: The issue is not clearly described in the bug report.
EB: When I try to view the scoped type hierarchy in binary projects (e.g. org.apache.ant), I expect to see the class hierarchies of the internal jars. Instead, I receive the error message 'No declaration of selected members in the chosen hierarchy of 'org.apache.ant'.' I would like to understand the meaning behind this error message.
SR:
1. Open a binary project (e.g. org.apache.ant).
2. Attempt to view the scoped type hierarchy.
3. Observe the error message 'No declaration of selected members in the chosen hierarchy of 'org.apache.ant'.
